com.davidbracewell.stream

Enum SparkStreamingContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SparkStreamingContext>
      • com.davidbracewell.stream.SparkStreamingContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamingContext, Serializable, AutoCloseable, Comparable<SparkStreamingContext>

    public enum SparkStreamingContext
extends Enum<SparkStreamingContext>
implements StreamingContext
    Represents a distributed streaming context using Sparks's rdd classes
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      The singleton instance of the context
